summary:
A multidimensional time and space travelling blue box which also doubles as a fairly large player home.
From the popular British TV series Doctor who. Currently a massive work in progress.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Everyone and thanks for viewing this page.
I\'d like to start this by saying this mod is currently being developed and is in VERY early stages.
Tardis will appear in Whiterun next to cow.
Seems to be incompatible with open cities at the moment.

I have found someone who has kindly offered to help with scripting and features, his previous work can be found on Fallout New Vegas nexus under \"Fallout Who\". 
Tardis still travels to 60 locations at the moment but is being built on.

Some Features on the cards;
Regeneration
Time crash
Interactive console
Sonic Screwdriver

The reason I am putting this page up is to show you guys where I currently am in the development process and for your inputs on ideas and designs. 


Here are the rooms which are currently being produced or have been completed. This is subject to change on the communities ideas.
Screenshots will be uploaded so progress can be viewed and comments made.

Room:                                                 Status:
Primary console Room                           Completed       
Engine room                                         Completed
Heart of the TARDIS                               Completed
Infirmary                                               Completed
Wash Room                                            In progress
Main Cupboard                                       n/a
Grand Library                                         n/a
Sitting Room                                          n/a
Swimming pool                                        n/a
Altar Room (church?)                               n/a
Architectural Reconfiguration Room          n/a
Armory                                                  n/a
Display area                                            n/a
Gardens                                                 n/a
Primary Office                                         n/a
Smithy                                                    n/a
Enchantry                                               n/a
Dining Hall                                               n/a
Kitchen                                                   n/a
Wine Cellar                                              n/a
Arena                                                      n/a
Prison/Holding Cells                                  n/a
Guest Bedroom(s)                                     n/a
Master Bedroom                                       n/a


Any Ideas? Comment!

Textures and meshes for exterior TARDIS are credited to Murfy27.
Original mod by Shatteredsteel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35774/?
